jomon kiyanne dhanawath wyaparika pawulaka thunweni daruwa.meyata sahodara-sahodariyan thun denek innawa.eeth meya eyage akka,ayiya,nangi wage neweyi.wenas kenek.meyata oone thamange jiwithe nidahase gewanna.eeth thaththa hamathissema uthsaha karanne meyawa wagakimak daranna puluwan kenek karanna.meya thaththawath rawattagena,igenaganna nidahasa oone kiyala boruwata kiyana gaman godak wada manga arinawa.mehema kalayak yaddi meyage thaththage wyapara walata naraka kaladasawak enawa.thaththa gawin hitapu godak aya ethakota eyawa dala yanawa,eyage lamayinuth athuluwa.eeth jomon me welawe hewanallak wage thamange asarana thaththa gawin innawa.kohomawunath meyalata eyalage ge pawa nathiwenawa.jomon witharayi thaththage pihitata ithuruwenne.nidahase kisi wadak nokara hitapu jomon methanadi thaththata udawu wenne kohomada?meyata thamange pawula me walen godaganna puluwan weyida?ehema godaganne kohomada?me dewal filuma balanakota oyalata dakinna puluwan weyi !
